1.0.0.en: Added support for new device ZP3102.EU (Motion sensor);

1.1.0.en: Added support for new device RGBWE27ZW.EU (RGBW bulb);

1.1.3.en: Added color support for RGBWE27ZW.EU (RGBW bulb);

1.2.0.en: Added support for new device RGBWE2.EU (RGBW bulb 2);

1.3.0.en: Added support for new device PH-PAN04.EU (Switch double);

1.4.0.en: Added support for new device HM-HS1SA-Z.EU (Smart smoke sensor);

2.1.0.en: Added support for new device WT-RFID (Mini RFID keypad);

3.2.1.en: Added support for new device PH-PSR03-1B.EU (Keyfob 5 remote);

3.2.3.en: added support for NE-NAS-DS01Z.EU, added extra manufaturerId to multiquad, finished support for  NE-NAS-AB02Z.EU

3.4.0.en: update npm packages, added titleFormatted for flows, added device GR-105
